message: At the end of the street, I see the sign for the courier's shop.
Just as I start toward it, I notice a crowd in the middle of the road.
It looks like a fight. A bunch of people with nothing better to do have gathered to watch.

I keep walking, trying to avoid the whole mess.
But then the crowd stirs, followed by a high-pitched scream.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hm?"
I peer through the gaps in the crowd.
A large man is sprawled out on the ground, another standing over him.
The second man has his back to me, but I recognize him immediately.
A bright red kimono and a big sword. There's no one else it could be.

name: 紅雀
message: "For a big guy, you sure went down easy. Way to make a fool of yourself in front of your girlfriend."

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Kyaaa! Koujaku!"

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "He's so cool! And sooo dreamy!"

Starry-eyed girls flock to the victor, trampling the man on the ground in the process.
Here we go again...

name: 大男の彼女
message: "Umm... I'm really sorry..."
One woman, who was keeping a bit of a distance, approaches with an apologetic bow.

name: 大男の彼女
message: "This is all because I told him I wanted you to do my hair..."

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Who do you think you are?!"

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "Yeah! Wait your turn!"
She must be the girlfriend of the man sprawled on the street.
I'm guessing the commotion started when they tried to cut in line at Koujaku's shop.
Calming his angry fans with a gesture, Koujaku gives the girlfriend a smile.

name: 紅雀
message: "I'm glad you think so highly of my skills, miss, but all of my customers are important. We can't have people cutting in line, you know?"

name: 大男の彼女
message: "I know..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Your boyfriend might have taken things too far, but he was doing it for you. Don't be too hard on him, 'kay? Anyway, come back later. I'll hook you up."

name: 大男の彼女
message: "Thank you!"
The woman's eyes sparkle, her cheeks turning bright red.
There goes another one...
Koujaku's other fans are not amused.

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "Hey! How long are you gonna stand there? Move!"

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Oh, Koujaku! You must be sweaty! I just bought this handkerchief... but you're welcome to use it!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Nah, I couldn't. You bought it for yourself, right? Keep it."

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Please! I'm sure my handkerchief would be honored!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Well... What kind of man would I be if I said no to that?"
Koujaku takes the woman's hands, pulling her toward him with a smile.

name: 紅雀
message: "Thanks. I'll make good use of it."
There it is. His infamous lady-killer smile.
Well, that's what I call it, at least.

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Haaaaah!"
The woman with the handkerchief slumps to her knees, attracting jealous glares from the others. Every woman here seems out for blood.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Let's get out of here."
This isn't the first time I've seen this schtick.
Disgusted, I start to move away from the crowd.

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba?"
...Ugh.
I can feel all those eyes focusing on me.
I'll pretend I didn't hear him.
I turn around and start walking at a brisk pace.

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey, hold up!"
But Koujaku runs after me and grabs my arm.
Here we go again...

name: 紅雀
message: "I knew it!"

name: 紅雀
message: "What's with the cold shoulder? You shoulda said something."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah... I was just passing by on a job."

name: 紅雀
message: "A delivery?"
Koujaku smiles indulgently, which of course makes the women around him swoon again.
His smile's like a weapon. He's been using it for ages, but women still fall for it.
I really don't feel like talking here. There are too many people around... and the women's eyes are scaring me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Aren't you supposed to be working? I guess that might be hard with all this."

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah, this guy thought he could skip the line. I took care of it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You know, if you don't cut this stuff out, sooner or later someone's gonna cut you."

name: 紅雀
message: "Cut me? Who would do that?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Just take a look around you..."
I sweep my gaze over the women glaring at me. It was clear that they weren't about to let anyone, man or woman, get close to Koujaku. Scary.

name: 紅雀
message: "Oh. Well, I'll be fine. Do I really look like such an easy target?"
Koujaku punctuates this with a smirk.
Seriously?
Well, I guess I can't argue with him there.

Koujaku's pretty much always been aware of how handsome and popular he is.

He's not the type to brag about it, but he has a casual confidence about him, and he knows his way around a fight.
He's a wandering hairdresser. All he does is cut and style women's hair, but apparently he's developed quite a reputation for it.
He sets up shop wherever and whenever he feels like it. He doesn't advertise or take reservations, but he always has a line around the block.
They all say that when Koujaku touches your hair, it feels like you've died and gone to heaven.
...I just don't get it.
If you told me a guy like this existed, I wouldn't believe you for a second if I didn't already know him.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Anyway, you should cool it with the player routine. How many hearts do you think you've broken?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Easier said than done, bro. Not gonna turn down an offer. Women are one of life's greatest pleasures, yeah?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Beautiful, sexy... Gotta treat 'em right."

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "You're so cool!"

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "I love you!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Whatever floats your boat... I gotta get going."

name: 紅雀
message: "Right."

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Koujaku, hurry!"

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "Hey! It's my turn next."
As soon as I end the conversation, the women swarm Koujaku.
He shoots me a look from the center of the crowd.

name: 紅雀
message: "Oh, almost forgot. Tell Miss Tae I said hi. I'll swing by again soon."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, sure."
I shrug and walk off.
Still, the guy never gets enough, huh?
I mean, he must like it, but I know I would hate to be the center of all that attention. I guess he's a special breed.
I head for the courier, leaving the crowd behind.
